history.action: ‚öôÔ∏è ISSUE TRACKING TEST COVERAGE (C313) ‚Äî Created packages/core/tests/unit/issues.test.ts with 38 tests addressing Issue #126 acceptance criteria. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Test-first verification of parser confirmed it already works on canonical format ‚Äî the original 0% compliance was format drift not parser bug. Lesson: Before fixing, verify the bug still exists with tests ‚Äî bank format was likely corrected during C311 sync.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Pre-launch infrastructure audits surface hidden dependencies (NPM_TOKEN not in GitHub secrets but required by publish.yml). Lesson: Create dedicated tracking issues for human-action items that could block automated workflows.
